PARAM_LOCK_MISSING.description: Missing params hash/parameter lock for reproducibility.

PROVENANCE_MISSING.description: Missing provenance fields required for reproducible runs.

UNDECLARED_EXCLUSION.description: Run declares exclusions/filters not specified in reproducibility metadata.

NON_DETERMINISTIC_SOURCE.description: Run depends on non-deterministic inputs not declared/pinned (e.g., unpinned dataset version).
